title: How to Make Avocado on Toast

steps.headline: Peel or scoop the avocado flesh from the outer skins.
steps.description: Roughly Chop and put aside.You may also mash them to simulate scrambled eggs, but ideally there should be some texture. Ideally this should be done just before serving.

steps.headline: Toast your bread to your own tastes.
steps.description: This recipe contains no butter, so it is vegan, but if you are uncomfortable with the idea of dry toast, you may spread a little avocado on first to replicate butter.

steps.headline: Top toast with the Avocado, sprinkle with salt and coarsely ground pepper and drip chili sauce on top to taste.

text: Peel or scoop the avocado flesh from the outer skins. Roughly Chop and put aside.You may also mash them to simulate scrambled eggs, but ideally there should be some texture. Ideally this should be done just before serving. Toast your bread to your own tastes. This recipe contains no butter, so it is vegan, but if you are uncomfortable with the idea of dry toast, you may spread a little avocado on first to replicate butter. Top toast with the Avocado, sprinkle with salt and coarsely ground pepper and drip chili sauce on top to taste. Serve immediately.
